As long ago as 1971, Richard Nixon was heard on the Oval Office tapes grousing about "the Donald Rumsfeld problem." Donald Rumsfeld was a Presidential aide and maybe too big for his britches. Donald Rumsfeld is a different cup of tea, Richard Nixon said. Nearly three decades later, "the Donald Rumsfeld problem" came to the Pentagon with orders from President Bush to shake the place up.
